name: Acid Slugs (61)
description: Adds specialized storage for enhanced Shotgun ammunition to increase damage by 30% of base damage.
special: Hitting [7] Shotgun Shots in a single burst applies acid on the target.

name: BloodLust (61)
description: An inscribed component that increases melee weapon damage by 30% of base damage.
special: Increases melee damage by 75% for 10 seconds when using melee attacks on an enemy.

name: Emergency Power (61)
description: An inscribed component that augments javelin Ultimate gear and increases damage by 30% of base damage.
special: Ultimate meter refills instantly when armor is critically damaged. Can occur once every 120 seconds.

name: Extended Sniper Magazine (61)
description: Adds specialized storage for enhanced sniper rifle ammunition. Increases damage by 30% of base damage.
special: Increases maximum magazine size of sniper rifles by a large amount.

name: Extended Special Arms Magazine (61)
description: Adds specialized ammo storage for heavy pistols and grenade launchers. Increases damage by 30%.
special: Increases maximum magazine size of heavy pistols and grenade launchers by a large amount.

name: Feedback Loop (61)
description: Adds specialized storage for enhanced Assault Rifle Ammunition. Increases damage by 30% of Base damage.
special: Increases damage resistance by 50% for 10 seconds when firing the last shot in an assault rifle magazine.

name: Focused Freeze (61)
description: Adds specialized storage for enhanced Light Machine Gun ammunition. Increases damage by 30% of base damage.
special: On a consecutive LMG hit-streak (10), shots freeze the target.

name: Giant Slayer (61)
description: Adds specialized storage for enhanced marksman rifle ammunition. Increases damage by 30% of Base damage
special: Increases weak point damage by 50% after a consecutive Marksman rifle hit streak [5].

name: Rapid Hollow Points (61)
description: Adds specialized ammo storage for machine pistols and autocannons. Increases damage by 30%.
special: Increases weak point damage of machine pistols and autocannons.

name: Rejuvenating Ammo (61)
description: Increases reserve ammo for all equipped guns by 30% of base capacity.
special: Replenishes armor by 20% when picking up an ammo pack.

name: Softened Blows (61)
description: Increases javelin shields by a large amount.
special: Increases damage resistance by 75% for 5 seconds when shields run out.

name: Symbiotic Surge (61)
description: Increases javelin armor by a large amount.
special: Increases all damage by 50% for 10 seconds when picking up a repair pack.

name: Thermal Cooling (61)
description: Increases the javelin's heat capacity by 50% of the base capacity to allow the javelin to fly more effectively.
special: Reduces time you stay overheated significantly.
